name: Studio Digital Caffeine
title: lead programmer, designer
shortDes: Various projects for all platforms, focusing on Console and Mobile games
section1:
I joined the SDC team during the launch of Chained to start work on the next full game from the studio, which is a cross-platform multiplayer card game. Since them we've begun work on an additional mobile title.

Both games we're working on will be releasing in 2022, and I've already learned and developed quite a bit in regards to crossplay multiplayer systems for these projects.

section2.Platforms: Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PlayStation 4 + 5, Windows, Mac, Android, iOS
section2.Responsibilities:
• Collaboratively Design, Prototype, and Develop game ideas
  • Build backend systems and client implementations for cross-platform multiplayer experiences based on platform development documents
  • Ensure successful cross-platform builds
